issue.title: Final Competition Worlds Quite Different from Test Worlds?

content.raw:
Sorry about the confusion. All I meant is that task 1 will always start aligned with the +X axis, but task 2 and task 3 might end up in different orientations depending on where the path takes them. There will be no worlds with only a single task during the finals.

You can create worlds for testing using [this](#!/osrf/srcsim/wiki/world_generator) tutorial.
content.html:
Sorry about the confusion. All I meant is that task 1 will always start aligned with the +X axis, but task 2 and task 3 might end up in different orientations depending on where the path takes them. There will be no worlds with only a single task during the finals.

You can create worlds for testing using this tutorial.
